About

My Fianc√©e and I like to watch something while we eat dinner together. One night I was wanting to watch an episode of Rick and Morty but was having a hard time selecting an episode. I wanted a way to easily pick a random episode for us to watch. That is how I came up with the idea for showDecider. I wanted to also create a static website hosted in S3, so I choose to have the application be a website.
